ingredients: 1 large egg, beaten, 1   +   1/2 medium lemons, juiced, divided, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 pinch garlic powder, 1 pinch paprika, 6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 6 slices  lemon, for garnish, 2 sprigs fresh parsley, for garnish
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 111mg 37%, Sodium 413mg 18%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 32g, Vitamin C 45mg 226%, Calcium 60mg 5%, Iron 3mg 16%, Potassium 452mg 10%
